body.p:
To His Excelency
B. Magoffin Gov of Ky
Your Petitioner
Elias White

Would respectfully represent unto your Excelency that at the March Term 1860 he was tryed in the Madison County Circuit Court for a Breach of the Peace by fighting with Thomas Rhodes and fined Ten Dollars & cost
He is very Poor with a wife & six children and he is unable to pay said fine
Wherefore he prays your Excelency to remit said fine
We the undersigned Citizens of Madison County unite in the Prayer of the foregoing Petition

P. P. Ballard
H. Doolin
W W Embry
Brutus Crooke
Will Walker
C A Hawkins
C. H. Donaldson
Joshua D Park
Ed. W. Farmer
Will Jennings
J R Williams
J, W, Crooke
Talon Embry
H. H. Gibson
R. G. Burton
Isaac Hutchison

Madison Cir Ct
$10 } Breach
E White
Issd July 22 1862
